price: Sag: Mein Herr, wenn immer Du mir zeigst, was ihnen angedroht wird,
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
